places_with_reviews.name: TATVARAJ FARMS, tambadi,Kolad
address: TatvaRaj Farm, Roha Gohsale Road , near Krishna Hotel Tambadi , tal, Dist, Roha, Tambadiwadi, Maharashtra 402109, India

reviews.text:
Super service n food with all jain option. .
Good ambiance and support form team and owner very down to earth and specially kitchen staff super friendly and always smile on the face .

Keep doing better must visit

Well to start, our experience at Tatvaraj Farms was extremely blissful and satisfying. Everything from rooms, amenities to food and staff was sheer perfection.
Rooms were extremely spacious and clean with a beautiful view of nature.
Play area and swimming pool were again extremely well maintained.
The food is super delicious and the staff is extremely courteous and friendly, you will feel like you're having food at your home.
The staff was so helpful that they never said 'no' for anything.
They give you a feeling as if one big family of staff is pampering you on your holiday.
The resort is situated in them middle of nature and the rooms are surrounded by beautiful trees and flowers.

Its too good to be true types!
special Mention of Mr. Mahavir who took care of everything very nicely.

Excellent place! Vibe is good! Staff is very co operative ! Food is great ! Must visit place !
1)They serve completely veg food and make extra efforts for kids food as well.

2)The owner herself is active and kind.
She makes sure her guests are treated well by their needs.

3)Do visit this place and cherish the family times !

Honest Review!

Overall the property is descent. Room size are big and offer good view. Food quality is good with limited options for each meal, btw this is pure veg restaurant . It also serves limited Jain food. Good swimming pool with descent music. Good amenities and play area where you can enjoy all the internal games like pool, TT, carom and also has Karaoke setup.

The day we visited, there was a day school picnic arranged with some 40-50 kids which were using all the amenities.

The property internal area is too small and feels as if you are exploring a bungalow property. With the amount they are charging the property is not that giant or big to explore.

Needs improvement in below area :

1. Food or cuisine spread should be more like some fruits or salad spread should be added . Very limited options in breakfast, any additional food  you will have to pay extra.
2. Property area is too small and the arrangements which they have managed to accommodate in this area make very lesser space to have privacy and some breathing room.
3.School picnic should be avoided or made available during the odd days when you don't have any room booking.

Thanks Mahavir for the support during the stay!

Overall descent property and I would rate 3.5/5 based on my experience!

Thanks!

"Immaculate pool facility offering a tranquil escape with crystal-clear waters, spacious surroundings, attentive lifeguards, and a serene atmosphere perfect for relaxation and enjoyment for visitors of all ages. Highly recommended for a refreshing aquatic experience."

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Roha Pride
address: Roha-Ashtami Bridge, Near Dabir Complex, Near Kundalika River, Dabir Complex, Wali, Roha, Maharashtra 402109, India

reviews.text:
One of the budget hotels in Roha. Overall neat and clean. Don't expect high class services and facilities but good basic facilities.
In house food quality is also good.

Service was superb the people working there and the owners are very friendly and loving. Food option is just for vegetarians but the rooms are clean and good 👍
Overall experience staying there was good.. a place to recommend for a hygienic stay.
Very well located, bus station is close. Right on the bank of the river.. Delicious food with excellent service. Highly Recommended 👍
Good location for business work in Roha.  Though traffic noise is disturbing,  it can be accepted the way it is.

This is a wonderful place to stay with family, full value for money and great hospitality.
The hotel is at strategic location and easily accessible by railway station. The Best part is Four wheeler parking available...
The room is fresh, specious, clean, nicely decorated and well furnished. Each rooms in the hotel are given with a flat-screen TV.
Pure vegetarian restaurant available inside. The food is nice, room service is fast and the rates are reasonable.
One more good part was the convenience of check- in and check- out timing with a prior discussion…Overall, Staying in this hotel will be a memorable experience. Highly Recommended.

places_with_reviews.name: R26 Restaurant and Resort
address: restaurantsand resort, R26, near Roha, Khargaon, Roha, Maharashtra 402109, India

reviews.text: This was my favourite restaurant as my relatives live nearby. Before 8-9months it served delicious food and taste was amazing but recently it has been degraded. Hopefully they improve the taste rest all is superb.

Management should focus on quality of food . Mutton lapeta was very horrible , mutton was like rubber . Chicken was having smell . Shall never recommend anyone for main course.
Starters are ok .
Only good is ambiance …. Food quality is very poor .

Worst ever hotel dined in. Paneer used was bad. Was not able to cut into two.
Unimaginable wait time. Food served was ice cold. When asked for replacement waiter was hesitating to get it done. No one was attending even after repeatedly asking for. NAM BADA DARSHAN CHOTE.

Finest restaurant in Roha near hills and riverbeds. Good ambiance and great food. Serves vegetarian and non-vegetarian delicious food. Enjoy lovely nature with open space outside the restaurant. AC and non AC restaurant sitting are also available. Only server lunch and dinner. Good food at a great location. A good family restaurant also under construction rooms and a small swimming pool
Happy to be at R26 restaurant at Roha
Worst Place to go. Owner is not interested in customers he just want money for everything. We wasted our vacation. Choose any other place.

places_with_reviews.name: Nakshatra Farms
address: Barshet, Road, Tamdi Budruk, Roha, Tambadi, Maharashtra 402109, India

reviews.text:
Nice calm and cool place. Staff and owner are very Co-Operative. Respond to your suggestions immediately. Food is very tasty. They prepare it to your choice, taste and variety. Nice place for camping.
I have gone there in August 23   and again in February 24.
Rates also are reasonable..
Very good place to spend time with your friends and family. It is well maintained and the people working there are very friendly. Must visit!
An awesome facility for family as well as corporate outing. Superb food and a beautiful nature.

It's best place to visit with your family and friends. All staff members are polite and respectful. Food quality and other services are top notch. Pool is well maintained. Every room have AC. Must visit this place.
Had a great fun...Enjoyed lot in swimming pool. Food was excellent
